Module History::InstanceMethods
In: lib/history.rb

Methods

last_location   peek_last_location   redirect_back   store_location  

Public Instance methods

last_location(how_many = 1)

fetch last location. If how_many is given, fetch the nth location.

[Source]

     # File lib/history.rb, line 167
167:     def last_location(how_many = 1)
168:       ActionController::Base.history_container.back(session, how_many.to_i)
169:     end
peek_last_location(how_many = 1)

look at last location. If how_many is given, fetch the nth location.

[Source]

     # File lib/history.rb, line 162
162:     def peek_last_location(how_many = 1)
163:       ActionController::Base.history_container.peek(session, how_many.to_i)
164:     end
redirect_back(how_many = 1)

redirect to last saved location. If how_many is given, fetch the nth location.

[Source]

     # File lib/history.rb, line 172
172:     def redirect_back(how_many = 1)
173:       # it does not make sense to redirect_back an xml http request
174:       return false if request.xhr?
175: 
176:       last = ActionController::Base.history_container.back(session, how_many.to_i)
177:       unless last.nil?
178:         redirect_to(last)
179:         return true
180:       else
181:         return false
182:       end
183:     end

store location

     # File lib/history.rb, line 186

188:         ActionController::Base.history_container.force_store(session, request, response)
189:       else
